channel.title: [PI] How to change prices of points. [PI]
channel.description: On my PI server, I want to know how to change the prices of points, points being PkPoints, not coins. How do I change them?

item.title: [PI] How to change prices of points. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

go to shopassistant
src-server-model-shops

then search for something like this

	public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
		switch (id) {

then for the price you want it should be like this

			case 15038:
			case 15039:
			return 150; <------------ 15039 will be 150 but nothing below it but everything else will be above till another return, so making 15039 and 15038
			case 15040:  <------------ that means 15040 will be 200 but not 15039
			return 200;  <------ the return is making the items above 200

the number in the case is just the item id =p

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to change prices of points. [PI]
